verses.roman:
premāveśe puṣpodyāne karibena praveśa
sei-kāle ekale tumi chāḍi' rāja-veśa

synonyms: prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love; puṣpa-udyāne—into the garden at Guṇḍicā where the Lord stays; karibena praveśa—will enter; sei-kāle—at that time; ekale—alone; tumi—you; chāḍi'—giving up; rāja-veśa—the royal dress.
translation: "On that Ratha-yātrā festival day, after dancing before the Lord, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu will enter the Guṇḍicā garden. At that time you should go there alone, stripped of your royal dress.
